Dead by daylight is fun and highly addicting. The characters are cool and the cosmetics are better. Many people get involved in lore and make up their own stories and characters. However, the devs dont seem to have the same motivation or fascination. There are countless bugs and glitches and problems in general the devs are yet to touch on. While, yes I have played a lot, I have found myself resisting the urge to destroy my computer to bits and pieces due to tunnelers, campers, and horrible perks, Dead by daylight is still addicting and I have spent a lot of money on it.

Oyun çok güzel çok sürükleyici çok eğlenceli ama iyi bilgisayara sahip olana. Eğer benimki gibi ç*p bilgisayara sahipseniz aldığınız en fazla fps 25'ten yukarı olamaz. Güncel olması beni çeken bir özellik ama ç*p bilgisayara sahipseniz bu güzel özellikler alınması gereken zevk bir anda ç*p olur. İnternetiniz ne kadar fantastik olursa olsun ç*p bilgisayarda oynuyorsanız eğlenemezsiniz. Oyun ekonomik ama en iyisi olmak için gerekenler ç*p bilgisayar için fazla. Olur da param olur yeni bilgisayar alırsam üstüne bi 200 saat daha oynayıp bu yorumu yeniden şekillendireceğim. Şu yorumu yazarken ç*p bilgisayarımda bile aynı zamanda oynuyorum her maç sonunda yeni oyuna girmek için oyunu açıp kapamak zorunda bile kalıyorum. Para biriktirip en azından 1050Ti sistem alırsam bu yorumu yeniden yazacağım.

***SAFETY CONCERN: recently exposed as of November 2021, Dead By Daylight has an exploit that exposes your IP address, allowing hackers to DDOS your game, or worse, expose your real world address. Please, stay safe, and either get a VPN, or DON'T PLAY!***


simple concept on paper, 4 survivors, 1 killer. killer hits people twice, and puts them on a meat hook three times to eliminate them, survivors complete 5/7 generator objectives by holding m1 for 80 seconds, open a door and escape.
you are awarded currency based on doing a VARIETY of tasks. there's a rather unforgiving cap to how much you can earn a match.
both survivors and killers need to learn to loop around structures properly, and use their skills/powers correctly... but sometimes, there's not much one side can do. for example, some maps are impossible to navigate without wasting a lot of time, and some maps feature a large amount of deadzone, where the survivor may get downed rather quickly in. all in all, there's been balance issues since day one.
also, instead of the Killer being the host, as in the past, now there are "dedicated servers," which seemed to make things worse.
welcome, one and all.
bastante entretenido con bugs y toda la cosa 800 hs de juego

This game highly revolves around teamwork and/or your ability to hide and progress objectives for the Survivor role, but for the Killer role the game revolves around your speed and detection. It's a great game to play with friends, but if you try playing with people you don't know then you're bound to get paired with toxic players and disconnectors, or put against a Killer that face-camps everyone once they're hooked. If you don't know the meaning of face-camp, just play this game and you'll find out eventually. I'd recommend this game to others as it is a great horror-type game but if the DbD dev team could make the game prioritize ranks when searching for other people to play with, and harsh penalties to face-camping killers, that'd be great.

I've spent most of my relatively short time with this game on the fence about whether i wanted to support this dev with my money and whether i'd recommend it to others. Most of the problems with this game have already been addressed in someone else's much better review (Miraakles) so i'll just leave a brief review about what made my decision. 

A couple of weeks ago, i burned a killer offering called a Smoking splinter. This caused me to upon completing a killer game as trapper, go back to the killer menu and see level 1 nightmare (Freddy kreuger) and queue up for games as a level 1 freddy with a perk. i tried out each of his level 1 perks and had some fun in 5 or 6 games trying him out. so much fun that i added the elm street DLC to my wishlist so i could buy it later. Yesterday i burned a bone splinter to try out leatherface. it caused me to play a singular game as a vanilla cannibal with no perks or addons against a 4-man swf and as soon as the game was over, that was it, back to trapper you go. This they patched. THIS they patched? amongst a vast ocean of desync fuck ups that mean people get hit when they shouldn't or don't get hit when they should, broken matchmaking that will put rank 1 killers against a team of 3 baby rank 20's and a rank 9 or a rank 20 killer against a 4-man group of red ranks, bugs that will freeze your game in the loading screen and then either start the game for the 3 other survivors with a massive disadvantage or cancel the game leaving the killer back to their 30 minute queue, a toxic as shit community of subhuman scum playing killers and somehow even worse filth playing survivor, randomly survivors being unable to be unhooked or healed, randomly a totem is unable to be cleansed, survivors sometimes becoming usain bolt when they're hit (and not because of perks), daily rituals glitching out and resetting twice, survivors leaving through the exit gate and then dropping off the map and landing in the centre of the map repeatedly unable to win, certain achievements randomly becoming impossible to unlock for weeks, everything about survive with friends, killers who have been reported for literal months for exploiting game mechanics never getting banned, survivors who ragequit DC as soon as they get downed once completely fucking over the rest of the survivors chances of winning and screwing the killer out of points and achievements never getting banned, huntress hatchets that can hit a survivor from one side of the map to the other through solid walls, killers with wallhacks who can see the survivors at all times (not temporarily using perks) not getting banned, the list goes on. All of these things haven't been addressed in any way or patched or fixed. But they made damn sure to patch splinters so they work as intended instead of working how they actually should work. Add a battle pass and sell more cosmetics, but never fix any of the bugs or deal with the horrific matchmaking. 

No, I should not support this dev with my money.
No, I do not recommend anyone else subject themselves to this buggy mess or it's toxic "community".

プレイ時間1000時間越えと長らく遊んできましたが、運営のバグ修正の不対応、新たに発生する致命的バグの放置などなど迅速な対応のないゲームとなっています。ゲームのバランスも良いとは言えません。生存者・殺人鬼のどちらかが極端に有利な地形やマップなど、生存者のアイテムの持ち込み・殺人鬼の能力の強化等で有利不利がさらに加速し、公平な試合ができたと思えないことが多いです。またランク制度を設けていますが、ランク報酬等はなく、ただプレイヤーの熟練度が近い人とマッチングするだけのものとなっています。
　ゲームの更新が進めば、バグがなくなってより楽しくなると期待をしていましたが、そんなことはなかった。残念なものとなっています。もし、このゲームを遊んでみようと思う方は、バグや不具合・ゲームバランスに根気よく耐える覚悟をお持ちな方にお勧めです。
